channel.title: R on Website
channel.description: Recent content in R on Website

item.title: Exploratory Analysis on SNL Episode Ratings
item.description: Code and data can be found on Github Figured I should chime in here since it’s been… let’s see here… ah, 4 months.

item.title: An Introduction to Kidney Paired Donation, with ompr and ggraph
item.description: Code for this worked example can be found on Github

item.title: Interactive NCAA Hockey Player Maps using ggmap, ggimage, ggiraph, and leaflet
item.description: Code for the maps can be found on Github

item.title: Extract Mendeley Notes Using R
item.description: Code for this analysis is availabile on Github Thought I would offer up a quick post on something that had sidetracked me earlier this week, namely how to extract notes and annotations in Mendeley using R.

item.title: Text Analysis of NHL Hockey Coach Interviews
item.description: Code for this analysis is availabile on Github In the 2016 NHL playoffs, the Eastern Conference champion Pittsburgh Penguins, coached by Mike Sullivan, defeated the Western Conference champion San Jose Sharks, coached by Peter DeBoer, in a best of seven series to win the fourth Stanley Cup in their franchise’s history.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Code for this analysis is availabile on Github I plan on using this space to post my musings on statistics that, shall we say, fall outside of the hallowed halls of academia.
